name: Postman
title: postman.com
shortDescription: Postman is a comprehensive platform for API development, catering to over 40 million users including developers and companies. It streamlines the design, testing, and deployment of APIs, enhancing collaboration across teams. Users can manage API workflows, automate testing, and integrate with various tools, making it ideal for both small projects and enterprise-scale applications.
cons: Subscription can be expensive for small teams
